Articles.Content: I recently stumbled upon the Kerbalizer again on the KSP website. I had used it before on an old computer, and it worked great. Now I'm trying to play it again via demo version and it ceases to work. It keeps saying to install Unity Web Player, which I have 7 copies of, and I even changed the site settings to allow Unity to run. I have no idea how to fix this, and it would help if someone did.
Haven't ever been able to get it to work in the last 1+ year. And that's using Windows and Linux, Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox and several Linux browsers.
We're currently looking into the future of the Kerbalizer, because browser support for these plugin applications is fading fast. For more information, see here.
I just want an adorable Kerbalized version of me to stick into my avatar box on this forum.

3 hours ago, boocat said:

I just want an adorable Kerbalized version of me to stick into my avatar box on this forum.

Same here. 

Edit: Oops, didn't realize this thread is from October. 

Edited January 4, 2016 by DolphinDude3
